statements: SELECT * FROM sentencing_disparities;
SELECT id, defendant_name, sentence_duration FROM sentencing_disparities;
SELECT defendant_name, offense FROM sentencing_disparities WHERE sentence_duration > 5;
SELECT id, judge_name, court_location FROM sentencing_disparities WHERE defendant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM sentencing_disparities WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Judy' ORDER BY sentence_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentencing_disparities WHERE sentence_duration > 10 ORDER BY defendant_name DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT defendant_name, offense, sentence_duration FROM sentencing_disparities WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_sentences, AVG(sentence_duration) AS avg_sentence_duration FROM sentencing_disparities GROUP BY judge_name ORDER BY num_sentences DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentencing_disparities WHERE court_location = 'New York' AND offense LIKE '%theft%' ORDER BY sentence_duration DESC;
SELECT MIN(sentence_duration) AS min_sentence, MAX(sentence_duration) AS max_sentence FROM sentencing_disparities;
SELECT * FROM SentencingDisparities;
SELECT offense_type, sentence_length FROM SentencingDisparities;
SELECT reform_type FROM JusticeSystemReform WHERE reform_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SentencingDisparities WHERE offense_severity = 'High';
SELECT sentencing_date, offense_type FROM SentencingDisparities ORDER BY sentencing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentencingDisparities WHERE offense_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT sentencing_id, offense_type, sentence_length FROM SentencingDisparities WHERE sentence_length > 10 ORDER BY sentencing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentencingDisparities WHERE offense_severity = 'High' AND sentence_length < 20;
SELECT reform_type, reform_description, reform_date FROM JusticeSystemReform ORDER BY reform_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(sentence_length) AS longest_sentence FROM SentencingDisparities;
SELECT * FROM SentencingDisparities;
SELECT defendant_name, sentence_length FROM SentencingDisparities WHERE race='White';
SELECT defendant_name, offense_description FROM SentencingDisparities ORDER BY sentence_length DESC;
SELECT race, COUNT(*) AS count FROM SentencingDisparities GROUP BY race;
SELECT reform_category, proposed_solution FROM ReformAreas;
SELECT * FROM SentencingDisparities ORDER BY sentence_length DESC, defendant_name ASC;
SELECT case_id, defendant_name, offense_description FROM SentencingDisparities WHERE race = 'Black' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT sentencing_judge, SUM(previous_convictions) AS total_previous_convictions FROM SentencingHistory GROUP BY sentencing_judge;
SELECT * FROM SentencingDisparities WHERE sentence_length > 10 ORDER BY defendant_name;
SELECT reform_category, proposed_solution FROM ReformAreas WHERE reform_category LIKE '%Sentencing%' AND reform_id > 5 ORDER BY reform_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sentences ORDER BY sentence_date DESC;
SELECT sentence_length, crime_type FROM sentences WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT name, age, race FROM defendants WHERE age > 30 AND race = 'White';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE verdict = 'Guilty' ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT name, experience_years FROM judges ORDER BY experience_years ASC;
SELECT * FROM sentences ORDER BY sentence_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, age, race FROM defendants WHERE age >= 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, experience_years FROM judges WHERE experience_years > 10 ORDER BY experience_years ASC;

SELECT d.name as defendant_name, j.name as judge_name, c.verdict FROM court_cases c JOIN defendants d ON c.defendant_id = d.defendant_id JOIN judges j ON c.judge_id = j.judge_id WHERE c.verdict = 'Guilty';
SELECT crime_type, sentence_length FROM sentences WHERE sentence_length BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY crime_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM judges;
SELECT judge_name, court_name FROM judges ORDER BY judge_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM defendants WHERE age >= 25 AND race = 'White';
SELECT defendant_name, gender FROM defendants WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY defendant_name;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM judges ORDER BY judge_name DESC, court_name ASC;
SELECT defendant_name, age, gender FROM defendants WHERE race='White';
SELECT case_name, start_date, end_date FROM cases WHERE case_type='Criminal' AND end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT judge_name, court_name FROM judges INNER JOIN courtrooms ON judge_id = presiding_judge WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT judge_name FROM judges INNER JOIN sentences ON judges.judge_id = sentences.judge_id WHERE verdict = 'Guilty';
